```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
helper <- function(data) {
  print(sum(!is.na(unique(data))))
  print(sum(is.na(data)))
  print(class(data))
}
```

```{r}
f <- read_csv("data/custom_data/STAFF_FT_OCCUPATION_RACE_GENDER_F2024.csv",
                                   show_col_types = FALSE)
head(f)

f %>%
  count(`S2024_IS.Grand total men`) %>%
  filter(n > 1)
helper(f$`S2024_IS.Grand total men`)
```
